data.persona: I work directly under the King. I carry out orders and make sure laws are followed. I make decisions in regards local ordinances.
data.description:
You are in the The armory.
The near top of the tower 6 feet before the very top. Where the watchers keep their eye out for trouble. It's made of stone and has doors to several places including the outside. there are weapons from all over the world held within the armory.
There's a pike, a weapon, an armor, a sword, and a door here.
The dove and the guard are here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: give King's clothing to a royal prince

data.short_motivation: I'm going to prepare the prince to stand in for his father at a ceremony since the king is injured
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to ensure the prince is protected at the royal ceremony
data.long_motivation: I'm going to conduct an investigation and discover who injured the king, then execute them
